adjective.description: (of a passenger) issued with a travel ticket.
examples: only ticketed passengers are allowed through security

adjective.description: Issued with an official notice of a traffic offense.
examples: ticketed drivers should be more willing to accept their punishment and pay up

adjective.description: Denoting an event for which a ticket is required to attend.
(of a retail product) marked with a label giving its price, size, and other details.
